results.content: Very good explanations. Even after the first few videos, I'm already feeling very comfortable with his teaching style. The course is structured in a very easy to follow way. Even though he said  that he doesn't teach you the basics, he has already explained some things that other instructors just don't mention. I hope he comes out with some more courses. I will definitely sign up for them.
